description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
description.ru: С давних времён доблестные оммёдзи сражаются со скверной - злобными духами, рождёнными из человеческих страхов, боли и отчаяния. Рокуро с детства мечтал стать сильнейшим оммёдзи и очистить мир от скверны, но ужасная трагедия на долгие годы убила в нём всякое желание бороться. Но кому есть дело до желаний гиперактивного мальчишки, когда от него и талантливой девочки зависит судьба всего мира?
description.tr: Rokuro Enmado, kötü Kegare'yi ortadan kaldıran bir şeytan kovucu ailesindendir, ancak asıl hayali bir şarkıcı, futbolcu ya da şeytan kovucudan başka bir şey olmaktır. Benio Adashino adında başka bir şeytan çıkarıcı kız geldiğinde, Rokura aniden rekabetçi bir ruhla alevlenir ve doğal yeteneğini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. İkisi de kaderlerinde evlenip dünyadaki tüm Kegare'leri ortadan kaldıracak kehanet çocuğunu yaratmak olan iki nihai savaşçı, "İkiz Yıldız Şeytan Kovucu" olduklarını öğrendiklerinde rekabetleri daha da karmaşık bir hal alır.
description.pt-br: Rokuro sonha em se tornar tudo menos um exorcista! Então a misteriosa Benio aparece. Os dois são apelidados de "Exorcistas das Estrelas Gêmeas" e descobrem que estão destinados a se casar... Rokuro pode escapar de ambos os destinos? Quando o melhor amigo de Rokuro, Ryogo, desaparece, Rokuro é forçado a pedir ajuda a Benio para entrar em Magano, o reino dos Kegare, para resgatá-lo!

altTitles.th: พี่ชายสายบอดี้การ์ด

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

title.en: The Perfect Plan to Avoid the Death Ending

description.en: Reincarnated as Sienna Winter, a minor villain with a terminal illness, her only goal is survival. However, she accidentally awakens a sealed demon and gets trapped in a lifelong contract. But... she's already dying?!

Betrayed and killed by his fellow Ninestar guild members, the powerful necromancer Cha Jin-Hyuk resorts to a daring soul transference.

A decade later, he awakens in a new body, devoid of his former powers. With the support of his new comrades, Spirit Master Balkan and hobgoblin Haryu, he embarks on a quest for vengeance, scaling the mysterious tower once again.

Only this time, he possesses the overpowered abilities of an All-Master, enabling him to master all the classes within the tower!
description.fr:
La tour. Un endroit inconnu avec de nombreux changements rapides.

Dix ans plus tard, je me suis réincarné dans le corps d'un garçon qui vit sur Terre, en Corée du Sud.

"Le type qui m'a poignardé dans le dos et celui qui est au-dessus de lui... Je vais leur faire la peau.

" La personne qui a atteint le sommet en tant que nécromancien et a atteint la classe supérieure, le Maître de l'Esprit Cha Jinhyuk. En tant que "All-Master", il prendra sa revanche en grimpant dans la tour en tant que nécromancien.

description.en: One day, she verbally abused me all of a sudden… and it just doesn't stop there.

altTitles.ja-ro: Cherry Yuusha to Sei Naru Ken

altTitles.en: Cherry Hero and the Holy Sword

altTitles.ja: チェリー勇者と”せい”なる剣

description.en: In a world where heroes are always women chosen by the gods, the legend of a male hero seems to be just a myth. However, when a young boy named Cherio finds himself in the middle of a battle against monsters that threaten humanity, a goddess grants him the power of the male hero and the ability to unsheathe the mythical Holy Sword. Now, he must decide if he is willing to risk his life, not only to save the people he loves, but to fulfill a destiny that no one thought possible.

Sakura, a girl who has difficulty making friends. Kayo, a girl belonging to a literature club of which she is the only member. Yuri, a girl who seems to have a kind of one-sided rivalry with Sakura. Koyuki, a girl with a rather quiet character. These girls with totally different personalities unexpectedly cross paths when all four join their school's literature club!
description.ja: 物事を深く考えすぎるがゆえに友達を作れない桜。そんな桜がある日出会ったのは、部員一人の文芸部部長・花陽。桜を一方的にライバル視するお嬢様・百合や心の声では多弁、現実は無口な後輩・小雪と、個性豊かな残念美少女たちが文芸部に大集結!?

title.en: Itsumademo Mukashi no Kyorikan na Osananajimi

altTitles.ja-ro: Itsu Made mo Mukashi no Kyorikanna Osananajimi

altTitles.en: Childhood Friends Who Always Keep Their Distance
A Childhood Friend Who's Forever Stuck with Our Past Sense of Distance

description.en: After surviving World War I, Gary, a liquor-loving ex-serviceman, finally makes his way home. To his shock, Prohibition has post-war America in a chokehold! The curtains open on Gary's action-packed quest for a sweet, shining glass of booze!
description.vi:
Series dài kỳ thứ hai của tác giả "Harahara Sensei" (Cô Giáo Mít Ướt)
Garry, một cựu chiến binh có niềm say mê vô bờ bến với r.ư.ợ.u trong Thế chiến thứ nhất. Tuy nhiên, sau chiến tranh, luật cấm rượu đã được ban hành ở Hoa Kỳ. 
Đây là câu chuyện kể về một cuộc phiêu lưu của một con người yêu r.ư.ợ.u còn hơn cả mạng sống, sẵn sàng liều mình chỉ để thưởng thức những thức uống tuyệt đỉnh cùng những người đồng đội của mình.

description.en: The ruthless criminal “Great,” exiled to space for his countless crimes, is banished to the past alongside the King of the Universe, “Rohollah,” after their encounter in space. Great attempts to right the numerous wrongs he committed in the past to try and rewrite a better future…
description.ru: Преследуемый космосом за неисчисляемые злодеяния безумный преступник Великий после встречи с королём космоса Рохум Рогахой был отправлен в прошлое. Но сможет ли Великий исправить ошибки прошлого и переписать будущее...

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?
description.pt-br: Uma série de acidentes misteriosos acontecem um atrás do outro na cidade. Um ser demoníaco está desafiando a todos que os resolvam. Sumireko, uma aparentemente caixa comum de loja, deseja ser uma escritora e possui um corpo voluptuoso com muitos admiradores ardentes. Adashino, um admirador que parece com um jovem garoto é o caixa de uma livraria. Ele está mergulhado em mistérios, e de repente, o caminho pra ele e sua irmã voltarem para casa (em outro mundo) aparece. Uma história moderna de romance e aspirações começa!

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

title.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Survival Story of a Sword King in a Fantasy World

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81/103)
description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

altTitles.th: เกาะกระหายเลือด ฝ่า 48 วันโลกวิกฤต

description.en: The human army lost the battle against the vampires on Higanjima Island. Unable to prevent Miyabi's plan, Japan has become a vampire country. Six months later, there is a one-armed man fighting the vampires in abandoned Japan! The man's name is Akira Miyamoto. A warrior who has already tasted hell on Higanjima.

altTitles.ja: あそこではたらくムスブさん

altTitles.th: คุณมุสุบุกับงานของเธอ

description.en: Sagami Gorou works in sales at Shounan Rubber Industries Co., Ltd. He is secretly harboring feelings for Musubu, a girl working in the company's integrated development department. And what this lovely young scientist is researching day and night are actually…
description.es-la: La historia sigue a Sagami Gouro de 24 años que empieza a trabajar en Industria Shounan Gum S.A, allí conocerá a la investigadora Musubu-san una chica que trabaja en el laboratorio de desarrollo de asistencia médica la "casa", su primer encuentro no será precisamente el esperado.
description.pt-br: Sagami Gorou trabalha no setor de vendas da Indústria de Borracha Shounan Ltda e tem guardado seus sentimentos por Musubu, uma garota que trabalha no departamento de desenvolvimento integrado, em segredo. O objeto de estudo desta adorável cientista, na verdade é…

description.en: The first year of high school: Spring Mori, who has just entered school, learns of his classmate, Michioto, who is rumored to be the "treasure of the boys' school." Mori volunteered to ask for Michioto's contact information on behalf of a friend who was too scared to talk to him. Mori headed towards Michioto without really thinking about it, but the moment Mori sees him, it's love at first sight....

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về đuôi của bé chồn

title.en: Classmate no Moto Idol ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin Nan desu

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトの元アイドルが、とにかく挙動不審なんです。

altTitles.ja-ro: Class no Idol Bishoujo ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin nan desu

altTitles.en: The Idol Girl in My Class is Acting Suspiciously

altTitles.vi: Idol Cùng Lớp Tôi Cứ Đáng Nghi Thế Nào Ấy

altTitles.en: My classmate SHION SAEGUSA was idol, but she is unsure of behavior in front of me.

description.en: Saegusa, who retired from idolry when she went to high school, is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly, and is the most popular person at school. Takuya, however, knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today, too, a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is, in all likelihood, that Saegusa-san...?
description.ja: 高校進学を機にアイドルを引退した三枝さんは、容姿端麗かつ頭脳明晰。いつも明るくて人当たりも良く、学校で一番の人気者だ。しかし、そんな高嶺の花である三枝さんのとある一面を卓也は知っている。今日もバイト先のコンビニに現れる、怪しげな変装をした挙動不審な女性――。彼女はどう見てもあの三枝さんで…!?
description.vi: Saegusa, người đã từ bỏ thần tượng khi cô học trung học, xinh đẹp và thông minh. Cô ấy luôn vui vẻ và thân thiện, và là người nổi tiếng nhất ở trường.Tuy nhiên, Takuya biết một khía cạnh nào đó của cô gái saegusa nàyHôm nay cũng vậy, một cô gái trông đáng ngờ đang cải trang xuất hiện tại cửa hàng tiện lợi nơi anh làm việc bán thời gian.Cô ấy, rất có thể, là Saegusa-san...?Bộ truyện chuyển thể từ truyện tranh được chờ đợi từ lâu của bộ phim hài lãng mạn cực kỳ nổi tiếng với một nữ idol đáng ngờ và dễ thương quá mức!

title.en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daigoshou - Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.ja: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活　第五章　水の都と英雄の詩

altTitles.ja-ro: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai-5 Shou - Mizu no Machi to Eiyuu no Uta

altTitles.en: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-, Chapter 5: The City of Water and the Hero's Poem

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero — Começando uma Vida em Outro Mundo — Arco 5: A Metrópole da Água e o Poema do Herói

altTitles.ru: Re:Zero. Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире. Часть пятая: Звёзды, что творят историю

altTitles.es-la: Re:ZERO - Starting Life in Another World-, Arco 5: La Capital del Agua y El Poema del Héroe.

description.en:
The 5th arc of the Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu manga.

Subaru and Emilia receive an invitation to a party from Anastasia and decide to go to Priestella, the city of the watergates.
description.ja:
悪意が蠢く水門都市へ、集え歴戦の英雄たち。

『聖域』での戦いから一年、平穏な日々を送るナツキ・スバルだったが、王選候補者の一人、アナスタシアの招待により、一行は水門都市プリステラへと出発した。水の都で懐かしい面々と旧交を温めるスバル達。しかし、その裏では悪意が蠢いていて――。
description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.vi:
"T-tớ đã cắm sừng cậu, không chỉ một anh đâu...là ba anh lận cơ!"
Những câu nói như gai sắt cứa vào tim cậu từ cuối cấp hai năm ấy vẫn còn làm cậu ám ảnh. Akiyoshi Sunao, hiện tại cậu đã trở thành sinh viên năm nhất và làm thành viên của câu lạc bộ phim ảnh, cậu còn nỗi ám ảnh kia là từ mối tình đầu hồi cuối cấp hai của cậu, Lemon Nishikawa. Cậu đã mất niềm tin vào tình yêu suốt cả cao trung, đến khi lên đại học thì anh đã phải lòng crush mới hơn mình một tuổi tên Kogahara Natsumi. Ngay khi cậu nghĩ mình đã suýt thì "move on" và tìm được tình yêu mới để tận hưởng thanh xuân, "Cô bạn" bắt cá bốn tay năm nào lại vô tình xuất hiện. Khoảnh khắc ấy, những câu nói chí mạng như hiện về cứa cậu thêm phát nữa...Cậu đã cố gắng lảng tránh cô người yêu cũ ấy và cổ vũ bản thân vượt lên sự kiện mọc sừng ấy. Cậu suýt thì thành công...
"S-sao mình lại biến thành ghệ cũ của mình?!"
Cậu đã bị hoán đổi linh hồn với chính cô nàng người yêu cũ ấy, và đối phương cũng nhận ra điều đó. Họ phải làm gì để vượt qua nghịch cảnh? Liệu họ có nhìn nhận lại những góc khuất của nhau? Và liệu họ có trở lại với nhau? Mời các bạn đọc truyện nhé!~

Fun fact: Tiêu đề tiếng Nhật của truyện này có thể được dịch thẳng là "Hạnh Phúc Nhé, Con Đĩ!"
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

title.en: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke Is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

altTitles.es: El asesino que retornó como el hijo del Duque
El pibe que retorna como el hijo menor

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca

altTitles.th: ลูกชายคนเล็กของดยุกคือมือสังหาร

altTitles.ja: 回帰した公爵家の末息子は暗殺者

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

title.en: Yoku Wakaranai Keredo Isekai ni Tensei Shiteita You Desu

altTitles.ja: よくわからないけれど異世界に転生していたようです

altTitles.en: This is Screwed Up, but I was Reincarnated as a GIRL in Another World!

altTitles.zh-hk: 雖然不太清楚，不過我好像轉生到異世界了

altTitles.id: Saya tidak begitu mengerti, tapi sepertinya saya bereinkarnasi di dunia lain

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Con Gái, Tôi Sẽ Sinh Tồn Tại Dị Giới

altTitles.en: I Don't Really Get It, but It Looks like I Was Reincarnated in Another World

description.en:
Ren, a young orphan girl, has been sold off to a merchant with sinister plans for her. Suddenly, memories of her past life on a world called Earth come flooding back, and Ren remembers that she used to be a research scientist – and a grown man! As Ren escapes into the Dark Forest, magical powers awaken within her. In order to survive the harsh realities of this world, she must use her rekindled knowledge of Earth's science as well as her newfound powers! Will her magical cheat powers and past-life knowledge be enough to keep her freedom, or is she doomed to a life of servitude?
___
**Character Designer:** [Kaoming](https://mangadex.org/author/259d2f17-2e24-4346-aca8-1ecd2224c491)
description.ja:
「私、おっさんだった！！」

孤児の少女・レンは身売りされる途中で、前世の記憶を取り戻す。レンの前世は、三十代の男性研究者だったが、転生して今まで孤児として生きていたのであった。レンは、その身に秘められた魔法の才能と、前世の科学的知識を駆使して、ひとり過酷な異世界を生き抜いていく。

title.en: Hanitora! Shoukan Yuusha wo Hameru Honey Trap Hoi Mou

altTitles.ja: はにとらっ！ 召喚勇者をハメるハニートラップ包囲網

altTitles.ja-ro: Hani Tora! Shoukan Yuusha Hameru Honey Trap Houimou

altTitles.en: Honey Trap! The Encirclement of the Summoned Hero

altTitles.zh-hk: 陷害召喚勇者的美人計包圍網

description.en:
After defeating the evil god with his companions, Yuuri's adventure had come to a term.
All that remained was for him to go back to the world he came from... or so he thought, but it seemed like he would have to stay here?!

Now that he has to live in this world, Yuuri isn't sure what to do next and fears remaining a NEET.

In the meantime, the princess Lunaria, who knows Yuuri has little interest in power or luxury, sets up a honey trap as part of her plan to make the hero never leave her country.
description.id: Yuri sudah mengalahkan dewa jahat bersama teman-temannya dan menyelesaikan petualangan di dunia lain, Setelah itu yang harus dilakukannya adalah kembali ke dunia asalnya...! Tapi Yuri yang telah memutuskan untuk hidup di dunia yang berbeda, menyesali bahwa dia telah menjadi pengangguran, untuk bertahan di negaranya sendiri, yang tidak mau menghabiskan uang atau kekuasaan, para gadis-gadis cantik seperti putri Lunaria, pelayan, putri, dan orang suci, strategi fisik (Honey Trap) mulai bergerak!?
description.ja:
仲間たちと邪神を倒し、異世界での冒険を終えたユーリ。あとは元の世界に戻るだけ…と思ったら現地に残るパターンだった!?

異世界で暮らすことになったユーリは無職になったと嘆くものの、水面下ではお金にも権力にも無欲な彼を自国に留めるため、王女ルナリアを始め、メイド、令嬢、聖女といった美少女たちの身体をつかった策略（ハニートラップ）が動き始めており!?

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

description.en: Kang Tae-gwu is a monster, from the future, with the mission to eliminate Jung Eun-ji; the woman who grows up to be the famous Monster Slayer. In order to get close to her Tae-gwu has disguised himself as a hero named Sunbae. Will Tae-gwu be able to kill the Monster Slayer of the past and change the future?

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

**Awards:**
- Won the 2020 Next Manga Award in the Web category.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taishou Award.
- Won the top prize of the 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards.
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

title.en: Kuro Mahou Ryou no San Akunin

description.en:
By the Reiwa era, delinquents have been completely eliminated even from schools of magic...or so everyone thought. Even the "Black Magic Dormitory", formerly a wild and out of control place where the dark magic ne'er-do-wells gathered, is now on the verge of being demolished due to no new students having been placed into it for ages. The dorm's poor environment, residents receiving scorn and distain from teachers, and resulting low prospects of employment after graduation made the dorm's popularity sharply drop starting with Gen Z...until this year, when three female students are placed into it! So each of them makes an oath to themselves that they'll escape from the dorm, no matter what happens to the other two! 

However, those girls do not yet know the dreadful prophecy, which will affect the entire magical world, that is descending upon them.

(Source: Shogakukan)
description.ja:
ヤンキーは魔法学校でも絶滅寸前！

時は令和。かつてワルが集い荒れた【黒魔法寮】も、入寮者が途絶え廃寮寸前。だが今年の入寮生はなんと女子が3人！環境劣悪、先生に忌み嫌われ、卒業後の就職率も低い。黒魔法寮の現状を見た彼女達は、それぞれ胸に誓う。ここから脱出するのだ――他の2人はどうなってもいいから！

title.en: Marika-chan no Koukando wa Bukkowarete iru

altTitles.ja: 茉莉花ちゃんの好感度はぶっ壊れている

altTitles.id: Status Bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka Marika-chan rusak

altTitles.en: Marika-chan's affection meter is completely broken.

altTitles.es-la: El Medidor De Afecto De Marika-San Esta Completamente Roto

altTitles.pt-br: O medidor de afeto da Marika-chan está completamente quebrado.

description.en:
I’ve gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.──I don’t have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!?

Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chan’s meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?

Marika-chan, you don’t like me, so why are you so kind to me...?
──What is Marika-chan’s hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?
description.id:
Aku tiba-tiba bisa melihat tingkat rasa suka dari gadis yang kusukai.──Aku tidak punya keberanian untuk menyatakan cinta pada teman masa kecilku, Marika-chan. Suatu hari, aku membuat permohonan yang sangat kuat pada bintang jatuh: "Aku berharap bisa memahami perasaan orang lain, seperti di dalam game romansa." Dan ternyata, permohonan itu terkabul...!?

Di atas kepala para gadis di kelasku, muncul status bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka. Dalam kebingunganku melihat pemandangan aneh ini, aku memutuskan untuk memeriksa status barnya Marika-chan. Namun, status barnya justru melebihi batas, berubah menjadi status bar "neraka" yang benar-benar kacau...!?

Marika-chan, kalau kau tidak menyukaiku, kenapa kau begitu baik padaku...?
──Apa rahasia sebenarnya di balik sikap Marika-chan yang manis dan menggemaskan? Apakah dia benar-benar membenciku!? Atau mungkin sebenarnya...!?
description.ja:
あらすじ・内容
好きな子からの好感度が見えるようになりました。──幼馴染の茉莉花ちゃんに告白する勇気の無い僕。ある日、流れ星に強く願った「恋愛ゲームみたいに相手の気持ちがわかるようになりますように」すると、その願いは叶ってしまい…!?クラスの女子達に浮かぶ好感度メーター。非現実な光景に戸惑いながらも茉莉花ちゃんのを見に行くと、下限突破した地獄のメーターになっていて…!?茉莉花ちゃん、僕のこと嫌いなのにどうしてそんなに優しかったの…？――裏アリ可愛い茉莉花ちゃんの隠された本音は？本当にキライなの!?それとも…!?
description.pt-br:
Eu ganhei a habilidade de ver os níveis de afeição da garota de quem gosto. ──Eu não tenho coragem de confessar meus sentimentos à minha amiga de infância, Marika-chan. Um dia, fiz um desejo forte a uma estrela cadente: "Eu queria poder entender os sentimentos dos outros, como em um jogo de namoro." Então, esse desejo se tornou realidade...!?

Flutuando acima das garotas da minha turma estão medidores de afeição. Enquanto fico confuso com essa visão surreal, decido verificar o medidor da Marika-chan, apenas para descobrir que ele ultrapassou os limites, transformando-se em um medidor infernal...!?

Marika-chan, você não gosta de mim, então por que é tão gentil comigo...?
──Qual é a verdade oculta de Marika-chan por trás de sua fachada fofa? Ela realmente me odeia!? Ou é algo mais...?

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Shoukoku no Altair Gaiden - Toukoku no Subaru

altTitles.en: The Pleiades of the Island Nation

altTitles.ja: 将国のアルタイル嵬伝 嶌国のスバル

altTitles.vi: Sao Thất Nữ nơi Đảo quốc

description.en: The curtain rises on an Oriental Reconquista spin-off of Kato Kotono's "Shoukoku no Altair", set far to the east of Rumeliana is the once peaceful and beautiful island nation of Kusanagi, which has been annexed by the larger country of Cinili and fallen into ruin.

Ginger Torte and Lerajie Atlanta, both noble daughters of marquesses, are lifelong enemies and rivals. When Ginger's fiancé, Kishon Mickelson, is stolen by Lerajie, Ginger decides she's had enough!

But one day, Ginger stumbles upon a strange novel - one where Lerajie is the main protagonist, and she is the villainess! She tries her best to ignore it, but when things start playing out just as written in the story, she has no choice but to rely on the novel to change her doomed future as the villainess.

"Exactly what did I do to deserve this fate?! Why did I have to become the villainess?"
 
Enter the mysterious Prince Izana, the male lead of the novel. Confined within the depths of the Templar Tower for years by King Astor, he finally sees the light of day when his father passes away. But according to the novel, he's destined to fall in love with Lerajie, leaving Ginger to wallow in her own misery!
  
"All I ever did was live life as best I could! But as if stealing my fiancé wasn’t enough, now Lerajie is going to claim the male lead?! No way I'll let that happen!"

The "villainess" Ginger, who now knows Prince Izana’s deepest secret (thanks to the novel), attempts to seduce him with -2% cautiousness and 200% cuteness!

---
For hopeless romantic Ginger Torte, getting engaged to the man of her dreams is a fairy tale come true. It isn’t long before she realizes the gut-wrenching truth — her fiancé has been seduced by her rival! The heartbroken Ginger finds solace in a new book that recounts the tale of a young woman and a cursed prince… But to her horror, the protagonist turns out to be none other than her beautiful nemesis, Lerazie! As reality unfolds according to the book, both ladies fall in love with the handsome prince at first sight. Ginger vows to steal both the spotlight and the prince’s heart! But, does this story harbor a sinister secret?

description.fr:
Fille de marquis, elle est belle et a un fiancé qu’elle chérit. Mais lorsque son ennemie de toujours lui vole son homme, une véritable guerre commence. En plus, elle tombe sur un livre qui reprend sa vie et où... elle tient le rôle de la méchante! Quand les choses se déroulent comme indiqué dans l'histoire, elle n'a pas d'autre choix que de s'appuyer sur le roman, si elle veut échapper à un destin peu glorieux.

description.ko:
열심히 살았을 뿐인데 라이벌에게 약혼자를 빼앗기고,
첫눈에 반한 남자마저 라이벌과 사랑에 빠지고….
나보다 쟤가 나은 게 대체 뭐야?

괴로워하던 ‘진저 토르테’ 손에 들어온 소설책 한 권.
라이벌 ‘레라지에’와 진저의 이야기가 그대로 쓰여 있는 수상한 소설책에서,
레라지에가 주인공이고 진저 토르테가 악녀…?
열심히 살았을 뿐인데 악녀라니… 악녀라니!!!
게다가 라이벌이 잘나간 건 모두 주인공 버프 덕분이었다고?

“레라지에, 네가 주인공이라고?
좋아, 그렇다면 네게 악역이 베푸는 미덕을 보여 주지.
남자 주인공은 내가 손에 넣어 주겠어!”

---

description.ru:
У неё была и так нелёгкая жизнь, но однажды она потеряла своего жениха из-за соперницы, в которую тот влюбился с первого взгляда, но чем она хуже неё? Неожиданно в руки Джинджер попадается странный роман. В этом романе рассказывается история соперничества Лераджии и Джинджер, где Лераджия является главной героиней, а Джинджер оказывается злодейкой. «Мне просто не везло по жизни, но я не злодейка! Хорошо, Лераджия, раз ты главная героиня, то я покажу всем достоинство злодеев! И я обязательно сделаю так, что один из главных персонажей влюбится в меня!»

---

description.uk:
«Все, що я коли-небудь робила, це проживала своє життя як могла, але мого нареченого вкрала моя суперниця, і чоловік, в якого я закохалася з першого погляду, теж її любить… Боже, що в ній такого прекрасного, саме ?” Роман потрапляє в руки змученої Джинджер Торт. У цьому дивному романі, який обертається навколо Джинджер та її суперниці Лераджі, Лераджі є головною героїнею, а Джинджер — лиходійкою…? «Все, що я коли-небудь робила, це важко працювала у житті... але лиходійка? Лиходійка?! І єдина причина, чому все пішло так добре для Лераджі, була лише тому, що вона була головною героїнею!» «Лераджі, ти головний герой?» Добре, тоді, як лиходійка, я покажу тобі, які чесноти я можу тобі подарувати. Я вкраду головного героя і зроблю його своїм чоловіком! Джинджер, яка тепер знає таємницю наслідного принца Ізани через роман, намагається вкрасти його у Лераджі...!

---
Джинджер Торте і Лераджія Атланта - шляхетні дочки маркізів, суперниці навіки. Коли Лераджія зваблює нареченого Джинджер, та вирішує, що з неї досить!
Але одного разу до рук Джинджер потрапляє дивний роман, у якому Лераджія головна героїня, а вона - лиходійка! Джинджер намагається забути про прочитане, але коли сюжет книги починає справджуватись, у неї не залишається вибору... Покладаючись на роман, Джинджер змінить свою долю лиходійки!

---

金洁儿的未婚夫被死对头抢走，连自己一见钟情的男人也和她坠入爱河…就在金洁儿痛苦不堪时得到了一本和现实处境一样的神奇小说。读心男主喜欢神秘感的主角？金洁儿以为拥有主角的项链就可以被避免读心，没想到一切竟成了……男主：我就静静地看你调戏我

title.en: There's a Rat in Our House

altTitles.en: There Is a Mouse in My House
There's a Mouse in my House

description.en: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space

altTitles.ja: キミのこと喰べていーい？

altTitles.zh: 可以把你吃 掉 吗？

altTitles.zh-hk: 可以把你吃 掉 嗎？

description.en:
I eat the same things at the same time. Your protagonist Omi Sorasaki is a high school student who's a devotee to the ordinary. But one day, a mysterious and beautiful girl transfers over and says to him "I have something to say to you alone after school." Omi's in a panic wondering "am I getting a confession?" as the things she has to say are…  
  
… and what happens after is only just the first wave of an assault on all that is ordinary! Thrust into an unusual world, a forbidden and "predacious" love comedy begins!
description.ja: 同じ時間に同じものを食べる。ひたすらに平凡を愛する高校生・宙崎 臣(そらさきおみ)。ある日彼は、転校生してきた謎の美少女に、「放課後ふたりだけで話したいことがある」と呼び出される。それはこれから襲い来る非平凡の波の始まりでしかなかった…！告白されるのでは！？ と思いきや、「キミのこと喰べていーい？」と語る彼女のお腹には巨大な口が…！グロテスクな舌に巻き付かれ、身動きがとれないオミはーー！？

description.en: Mizuho territory in the northeastern part of the island nation of Hiwazu. On the wedding day of his elder brother, Lord Saku, Ukano Isaza, the younger brother of the lord, meets a woman of the "stone people" who is supposed to have been told in a fairy tale, and is forced to make a contract with her...?
description.ja: 四方を海に囲まれた島国・日倭津国。先王の死後、この国は"王太子派"と"王弟派"の二つに割れようとしていた。その情勢下、北東にある瑞穂領は婚姻により"王弟派"につくことを選ぶ。領主の弟・宇迦乃イサザは、兄の婚礼の日に生じた混乱の中で、石を操る不思議な力を持つ「石の民」の女と出会い、婚姻を迫られることに……！？

description.en:
The Fierce Demons pride themselves as being the reigning delinquent gang of Mikado High School, but their name lets on much more, as they are being influenced by strange occult forces.
Dan Hayato, a mysterious transfer student with an unknown past, arrives at the school with a hidden agenda. With his power to separate his soul from his body, what does he know about the motives of the Fierce Demons and what events will lead to the destruction of the school?
description.ja: 帝高校夜間部のアイドル、氷河めぐみが、謎の老婆ミス・ヴァージン率いる黒門高校によって拉致された！彼女を救うために教師が招いたのは、檀隼人という謎の転校生。めぐみ奪還に動き出す隼人だったが、その役目は我らにこそあり、と帝高護衛団「烈鬼」も動き出す。果たして彼女を救いだすのは――？

Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.ms: Alya yang duduk di sebelah saya terkadang membisikkan kata manis dalam bahasa Rusia
اليا يڠ دودوق دسبله ساي ترکادڠ ممبيسيقکن کات مانيس دالم بهاس روسيا

altTitles.es: Alya a veces me susurra en ruso

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: The Story of Being Unable to Leave the House Because of My Older Sister

altTitles.ja: 姉貴のせいで家を出れない話

altTitles.ja-ro: Aneki no Sei de Ie o Derarenai Hanashi

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

A sweet and happy two year marriage felt like a dream. One day, her husband disappeared without a trace. Han Seoryeong, an ordinary housewife and blind woman, desperately searches for him... “You’ll never find him.” Her husband turned out to be the best secret agent with many faces. “Our marriage was everything to me, but it was just ‘work’ to him?” In the midst of her world crumbling, Seoryeong mistakenly unleashes the madness she had been suppressing.…
description.fr:
Deux années de mariage aussi douces qu’un rêve.
Mais un jour, son mari disparaît sans laisser de trace.

Han Seoryeong, femme au foyer ordinaire et non-voyante, part à sa recherche,
mais la vérité qu’elle découvre dépasse l’imaginable.

Son mari était un agent secret aux cent visages,
et tout ce qu’elle croyait vrai n’était qu’une façade pour son “travail”.

Dévastée par le désespoir, Seoryeong laisse exploser la folie qu’elle avait refoulée.
Si elle ne peut pas le traquer, elle choisira de devenir sa proie !

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

description.en:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?
description.es-la: Un oficinista asediado encuentra su camino a un café donde denuncia las dificultades de su rutina. Allí, una amable estudiante de secundaria gyaru se da cuenta de sus lamentos y después de oírle desahogarse, le anima a la manera de "gyaru" e intercambian contactos. ¿Qué será de esta improbable amistad?

altTitles.ja: キラキラ☆プリキュアアラモード

description.en: 14-year-old Ichika Usami loves sweets and wishes to become a patisserie. When she encounters fairy Pekorin, she is able to transform into Cure Whip to protect Kirakiraru, an energy that represents the feelings put into making a sweet, from the Kirakiraru Thieves. Ichika joins five other girls to form the KiraKira Pretty Cure team and protect the sweets!

description.fr:
C'était la première fois de ma vie.
J'ai passé une nuit avec un homme dont je ne connaissais pas le nom...
C'était un coup d'un soir avec mon futur mari.

title.en: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?

altTitles.ja: 蠱毒の胡蝶はどんな夢を見るのか？

altTitles.en: What Does the Poisonous Butterfly Dream of?

description.en:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs.

One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company.

Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs.
"Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!"

With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!
description.ja: 文明を破壊し人類を蹂躙した突然変異の虫の化身"鎧蟲"。その唯一の対抗策は、鎧蟲とは異なる進化を遂げた"虫"を宿す少女たち、"蝶妃"だけ。万年蝶妃候補生のアユミは劣等生のレッテルを貼られ、絶望の淵に立ちながらも「世界を救う」という使命を胸に日々鍛錬を続ける。しかし努力の先にアユミを待ち受けていたのは、親友の裏切りと耐え難い現実で――。
description.vi:
Thế giới này đã bị xâm chiếm bởi lũ bọ.
Với sự xuất hiện của "Thiết Giáp Trùng", những con quái vật côn trùng đột biến vượt trội hoàn toàn so với các vũ khí hiện đại, nhân loại đã bị tước đi nơi sinh sống. Những người có thể đối chọi với chúng là "Chí Điệp Giả", nhưng cô gái nuôi dưỡng "côn trùng" theo hướng tiến hóa khác với Thiết Giáp Trùng.
Một trong những ứng cử viên trở thành Chí Điệp Giả, Odamaki Ayumi, đang đối mặt với sự thật cô không thể trở thành bướm. Người bạn thân đáng lý phải ở cạnh cô ấy và là người mà cô ấy ngưỡng mộ đã rời bỏ cô ấy mà đi.
Những ngày tháng tuyệt vọng đó cuối cùng đã đến hồi kết khi cô ấy đứng trên bờ vực cái chết trong một trận chiến với bọn Thiết Giáp Trùng
"Đừng tưởng ta... sẽ chết vô nghĩa như vậy!"
Cái kết đã gần kề, cơ thể cô gái biến đổi thành một con bướm. Cú vỗ cánh của cô ấy sẽ mang đến một cuộc cách mạng cho thế giới...!

description.en:
"He", a police officer on his shift, happened to meet "her" on the streets, by chance.

Through its bold yet delicate brushwork and elegant prose, this stylish, full-colour comic
illustrates the subtle air of intimacy between these two individuals.

---
A chance encounter. A handsome policeman. A beautiful woman. A tentative love affair smolders on the snowy cobblestone streets, 
out of sight from those that might keep them apart. 

*Veil* is a beautifully illustrated full-color romance manga, told in stylish short vignettes, beautiful illustrations, and secret moments.
description.pt-br: Eles se conheceram na rua por acaso. Ele era policial e ela caminhava pela rua. Através de suas pinceladas ousadas, mas delicadas e diálogos elegantes, esta história refinada e colorida, ilustra o ar sutil da intimidade presente entre os dois.
